text:
From: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/INFRA-10815

<quote>
The current JMeter binary distribution includes multiple templates and documentation pages that use one of more of the following hosts:

jakarta.apache.org
issues.apache.org
jmeter.apache.org

From an infrastructure point of view this is not acceptable. Every single one of those needs to be updated to use localhost or some other host that will not place load on Apache servers or on any other 3rd party server.
</quote>
creator: sebb@apache.org
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Author: fschumacher

on infrastructure.
